actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the determination of the United States with respect to the situation in Cuba.

summary.text: Expresses United States determination: (1) to prevent the agressive activities of the Soviet Union and Cuba in the Western Hemisphere; (2) to prevent the creation of externally supported Cuban military capability; (3) to work with the Organization of American States for hemisphere security.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the determination of the United States with respect to the situation in Cuba.
